title: Karun Chandhok’s top Williams F1 cars
summary: Over the past 20 years, I’ve driven 34 different Formula 1 cars in total, including 14 world championship winners and one from every decade from the pre-war 1937 Aston Martin…

qa_pairs.question: How many different Formula 1 cars has Karun Chandhok driven in total?
What notable achievement does Karun Chandhok have among the cars he has driven?
From which decade did Karun Chandhok drive a pre-war Formula 1 car?
